attributes.comment: Nothing that CMS has ever implemented has saved us time or money.  CAQH already has all this information and could be the hub instead.  Also, everyone has Google.  I don't believe being unable to find a doctor is limiting anyone from seeking access to healthcare if they truly want/need it.  This will just add additional unnecessary costs to an already overblown agency.  And I'm sure, somehow it will add work at the provider level where we are already struggling to survive.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
